values: 轨道；（移动的）路径；路线；方向；（推土机等的）履带；跑道；音轨；声道；（人、动物、车辆留下的）足迹；踪迹；（幕帘的）滑轨；滑道；车辙；（人踩出的）小道；小径；一首乐曲；一首歌曲
跟踪；追踪；追随…的进程；<美>把（学生）按能力分班（或组）；<美>留下足迹

synonym.mean: 追踪；通过；循路而行；用纤拉

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 无路的；无足迹的；不在轨道上行驶的
追踪；追查；描摹；摹图；显迹
拉纤者，纤夫；追踪系统，[自] 跟踪装置；追踪者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指坚持不懈、毫不动摇地紧跟、追赶某人、某物或某个事业。
指根据线索或足迹进行跟踪。用于抽象意义时指找到某事物的根源。
指沿着人或动物留下的印迹或行迹追踪。
原义为“追猎、猎取”，现用于指追捕或搜寻逃犯等。
指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟随起引导作用的人或物，跟随的动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。
一般指对未知事物或新生事物的探索、观察与研究。
侧重按一定线索追查出结果。
一般指寻找所需的物件，或对罪犯的搜寻，特指追猎。
语义庄重，语气强，使用广。多暗示做出很大努力去寻求某人或物。

word_group.brief_definition: 追踪（或失去）关于…的消息；一直了解
保持跟踪, 注意动向, 保持追踪
在正道上；未离题, 正确
追踪；跟踪；追查
重新步入正轨, 恢复正常
步入正轨；做法对头
离去(尤指回家)
径赛项最好成绩记录；过去成就
捷径；快速成功之道
追踪（或失去）关于…的消息；一直了解
内圈跑道；有利地位
煤渣道；泥土跑道
循着正确的路线
轨道电路
保持浪漫关系；保持性关系
径赛诸项目
与世隔绝, 不寻常的
自行车专用路；非机动车专用路
循着错误的路线
可获终身职位的雇用制

bilingual.source: The height of the track varies from eight to ten meters above ground.
bilingual.target: 轨道高度在地面上方八到十米之间变化。

bilingual.source: The door is sliding smoothly along its track.
bilingual.target: 门在轨道上滑动得很顺畅。

bilingual.source: The signaller directed the train to the correct track.
bilingual.target: 信号员指挥火车驶向正确的轨道。

bilingual.source: The train travels at 60 mps on this track.
bilingual.target: 火车在这条轨道上以每秒60米的速度行驶。

bilingual.source: Engineers are testing new track circuit technology.
bilingual.target: 工程师们正在测试新的轨道电路技术。

bilingual.source: The train moves on the track with uniform linear motion.
bilingual.target: 火车以匀速直线运动行驶在轨道上。

bilingual.source: Without accountability, projects can easily go off track.
bilingual.target: 没有责任制，项目很容易偏离轨道。

bilingual.source: The roller coaster went down the track with a whoosh.
bilingual.target: 过山车沿轨道下滑时发出了一声呼啸声。

bilingual.source: The river is paralleling the railway track for several miles.
bilingual.target: 这条河流与铁路轨道平行了好几英里。

bilingual.source: When the track circuit fails, the train must slow down.
bilingual.target: 当轨道电路出现故障时，列车必须减速行驶。

list.abstract: Track（轨道）指盘上储存的信息资料是按一定规则排列的，形状像一条条轨道。在音乐光碟中每一首歌均为一轨，在数据光碟中从TOC(Table of Contents)目录，记录着关于碟片及各轨的资料，当Close Session时，目录会被写在Lead-In Area的Q子码通道里。其包含轨道数，所有轨道的起始地址，整个cd的长度等数据中记录起始地址的多个连续的逻辑扇区为一轨。扇区Sector(or Block)大小为2352 bytes的资料存贮单位，按时间算1秒=75扇区。轨是螺旋形排列，多个session由扇区组成的多个轨构成，数据被插入扇区并分布在一个较大区域中。Track在录音中指记录载体（例如磁带）上可以记录音频信号的通路。

yingyinNormal.en: The bullet train's immense speed is achieved with new electrified track across China and aerodynamic trains made from light weight composite materials.
yingyinNormal.zh: 高速列车的风驰电掣得益于遍及全国的新电气化轨道以及轻质复合材料制成的空气动力火车。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I was shopping. I was shopping. I know we haven't been on the same page lately. That we just got to get back on track, baby. So consider this a way too expensive peace offering. I think we've been more than off track.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚才在买东西，我在买东西。我知道我们最近产生了一些分歧。但我们得回到正轨上来，宝贝。所以把这当成一份贵重的谢罪礼吧。 我们已经不止是偏离轨道了。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, you want me to track her down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然了，你想我去追她。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll leave you to it. I'm gonna track down Link.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们忙，我去找林克。

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. Udinov has been considerably easier to track.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乌迪诺夫小姐更容易被追踪

yingyinNormal.en: There were a lot of accidents on the test track. That's why we call it a test track.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试车过程中总是会出现很多意外，所以我们才要试车。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what do you think? Am I on the right track?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得呢？我算步入正轨了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. Banker's hours. No wonder you're not on the tenure track.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像银行家般工作时间那么短。难怪你没机会成为终身教授。

yingyinNormal.en: There are some charts in the back where I kept track of shape, color and consistency. Disgusting. No, what's disgusting is he's still keeping track.
yingyinNormal.zh: 后面还有图表记录我的屎形，屎色与软硬度。真恶心。真正恶心的是他到现在都还会做记录。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No. Stan got on the management track at Home Depot. Oh, great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不不，他在家得宝零售店找了份工作。噢，太好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Farell almost strung us up by our bullocks for losing track of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为找不到你，法雷尔都快把我们折磨死了。

yingyinNormal.en: What about Ultron himself? Oh, he's easy to track. He's everywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那奥创本人呢？他很容易追踪，他无处不在。

yingyinNormal.en: We're gonna have to track the passenger information down one by one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得一个个的查旅客信息，才有可能做出统计。

yingyinNormal.en: The cell ejects the antibody, and it heads out to track down the virus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 细胞射出抗体，然后抗体去找那病毒。

yingyinNormal.en: No, Bernadette got me a Fitbit so she can track how much I'm exercising.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是啦，伯纳黛特给我买了运动手环，好追查我每天运动量有多少。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet weren't there two accidents on your test track during a rainstorm?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但在暴风雨中的测试中是不是出现过两次事故？

yingyinNormal.en: The auto industry we rescued is on track for its strongest year since 2005.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们所拯救的汽车产业正处于自2005年以来最好的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. Sorry, sorry, we're late. We kind of just, you know, lost track of time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，我们迟到了，我们有点忘了时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I'm not ready to have a baby. Oh, yes, you are! I track your cycle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我还没准备好要孩子。你准备好了！我算着你的生理周期呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Thought you might take my call. You understand if I make it difficult to track.
yingyinNormal.zh: 料你也不会不接，我想你知道，我设了反追踪。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 小径; 轨道; 跑道; 滑轨
一首乐曲; 音轨; 声道

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可追踪的；起源于；可追溯的
n. 跟踪；追踪；分班；统调；定位；漏电痕迹
n. 小道；小径；铁路轨道；线路；足迹；踪迹；车辙；歌曲；音乐；轮距；赛道；跑道

word_family.mean: v. 找到；发现；映描；描摹；跟踪；追踪；追溯；描绘；查考；追究

examination_example.sentence: Since weight loss is not my goal, it is less important for me to <highlight>track</highlight> my weight each week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为减肥不是我的目标，所以每周跟踪体重对我来说不太重要。

examination_example.sentence: Getting a DNT signal does not oblige anyone to stop <highlight>tracking</highlight>, although some companies have promised to do so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 获得DNT信号并不会迫使任何人停止追踪，尽管一些公司已经承诺这样做了。

examination_example.sentence: Chomsky's grammar should show patterns of language change that are independent of the family tree or the pathway <highlight>tracked</highlight> through it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Chomsky的语法应该展示语言变化的模式，这些模式独立于谱系或通过谱系追踪的路径。

sense_info_list.en: a mark or line of marks left by a person, animal, or vehicle in passing

examination_example.sentence: Trail blazes, tire <highlight>tracks</highlight>, and other features can lead you to civilization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小路路标，轮胎痕迹，以及其他特征都可引导你回到文明社会。

examination_example.sentence: Conceived in this way, comprehension will not follow exactly the same <highlight>track</highlight> for each reader.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以这种方式构想，对于每个读者来说，理解不会遵循完全相同的轨迹。

examination_example.sentence: The program keeps <highlight>track</highlight> of your progress and provides detailed feedback on your performance and improvement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该计划跟踪你的进度，并对你的表现和进步提供详细的反馈。

sense_info_list.en: a rough path or minor road, typically one beaten by use rather than constructed; a prepared course or
sense_info_list.zh: 小径; 轨道; 跑道; 滑轨

examination_example.sentence: For example, even in dense forest, you should be able to spot gaps in the tree line due to roads and train <highlight>tracks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，即使在茂密的森林中，你也应该能够发现由道路和火车轨道造成的树线间隙。

sense_info_list.en: the path or direction that sb / sth is moving in
a sport in which people compete with each other by running a race on a specially prepared circular path

sense_info_list.zh: 一首乐曲; 音轨; 声道

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 小道；小径；铁路轨道；线路；足迹；踪迹；车辙；歌曲；音乐；轮距；赛道；跑道

word_family.mean: v. 找到；发现；映描；描摹；跟踪；追踪；追溯；描绘；查考；追究

sense_info_list.en: a mark or line of marks left by a person, animal, or vehicle in passing
sense_info_list.zh: 足迹; 踪迹; 跟踪; 追踪

examination_example.sentence: Journalist Sarah Scoles reports that NASA currently <highlight>tracks</highlight> about 24, 000 objects in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记者 Sarah Scoles 报道，美国宇航局目前在追踪太空中约24,000个物体。

examination_example.sentence: Space Policy Directive-3 lays out general guidelines for the United States to mitigate the effects of space debris and <highlight>track</highlight> and manage traffic in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Space Policy Directive-3 为美国制定了缓解空间碎片影响以及跟踪和管理空间交通的一般指导原则。

examination_example.sentence: Satellite <highlight>tracks</highlight> both the herd and the lions in the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卫星追踪该地区的牛群和狮子。

examination_example.sentence: This conversational robot companion has cameras in its eyes, which allow it to <highlight>track</highlight> patients and use appropriate facial expressions and body language in its interactions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这款对话机器人伴侣的眼睛里有摄像头，它可以追踪病人，并在互动中使用适当的面部表情和肢体语言。

examination_example.sentence: The scientists <highlight>tracked</highlight> white storks from different colonies in Europe and Africa.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们追踪了欧洲和非洲不同聚居地的白鹳。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers in Germany used miniature GPS tags to <highlight>track</highlight> the migrations of 70 white storks (鹳) from different sites across Europe and Asia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德国的研究人员使用微型GPS标签追踪70只来自欧洲和亚洲的不同地点的白鹳。

sense_info_list.en: a rough path or minor road, typically one beaten by use rather than constructed; a prepared course or
sense_info_list.zh: 羊肠小路; (铺设)轨道; 道路; 跑道

sense_info_list.en: a sport in which people compete with each other by running a race on a specially prepared circular path
sense_info_list.zh: [体育]径赛运动; 田径比赛

sense_info_list.en: a course of action; a way of proceeding

examination_example.sentence: The results highlight the need to develop effective early interventions to help those with attention problems stay on <highlight>track</highlight> academically.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些结果突显了形成有效的早期干预措施的必要性，以帮助那些有注意力问题的人在学业上保持在正轨上。

sense_info_list.zh: (on track)在正道上; 未离题/目标

examination_example.sentence: Nicole admitted she was fortunate, as she was able to live with her parents to get herself on <highlight>track</highlight> financially.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Nicole承认她很幸运，因为他可以和父母住在一起，让自己在财务上走上正轨。

examination_example.sentence: You might lose down the <highlight>track</highlight> by injuring your future career prospects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会因损害你未来的职业前景而迷失方向。

sense_info_list.en: (of a film or television camera) move in relation to the subject being filmed
the transverse distance between a vehicle's wheels

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追踪(或失去)关于...的消息；一直了解

sense_info_list.en: a mark or line of marks left by a person; animal; or vehicle in passing
sense_info_list.zh: 足迹; 踪迹; 跟踪; 追踪

examination_example.sentence: Nutrition scholar Marion Nestle of New York University spent a year informally <highlight>tracking</highlight> industry-funded studies on food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽约大学的营养学家 Marion Nestle 花了一年时间非正式地跟踪行业资助的食品研究。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists from two Belgian universities spent a month in the extreme heat <highlight>tracking</highlight> the ants and digging out their nests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自比利时两所大学的科学家们在极度高温中花了一个月的时间来追踪蚂蚁，并挖出它们的巢穴。

examination_example.sentence: Sociologist Dashun Wang <highlight>tracked</highlight> more than 1,100 scientists who were on the border between getting a grant and missing out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会学家王大顺追踪了 1100 多名处于获得资助和错失机会边缘的科学家。

sense_info_list.en: a course of action; a way of proceeding

examination_example.sentence: It is difficult for anumeric people to keep <highlight>track</highlight> of the change in numbers even when the total is very small.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于不懂数字的人来说，即使总数很小，也很难跟踪数字的变化。

examination_example.sentence: Responses suggest that anumeric people have some trouble keeping <highlight>track</highlight> of how many nuts remain in the can.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回应表明，数字人也很难记录罐头里还有多少坚果。

sense_info_list.zh: 羊肠小路; (铺设)轨道; 道路; 跑道

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 追踪(或失去)关于…的消息；一直了解

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 小道；小径；铁路轨道；线路；足迹；踪迹；车辙；歌曲；音乐；轮距；赛道；跑道

word_family.mean: v. 找到；发现；映描；描摹；跟踪；追踪；追溯；描绘；查考；追究

sense_info_list.en: a mark or line of marks left by a person, animal, or vehicle in passing
sense_info_list.zh: 足迹; 踪迹; 跟踪

examination_example.sentence: The quality of grassland will be <highlight>tracked</highlight> by monitoring the shape, color and texture (质地) of grass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 草地的质量可以通过监测草的形状、颜色和质地来追踪调查。

sense_info_list.en: a course of action; a way of proceeding

examination_example.sentence: Keep <highlight>track</highlight> of your efforts and write down how you feel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记录你的努力，写下你的感受。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 足迹; 踪迹; 跟踪; 追踪

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 短道速滑；短道速度滑冰

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 追踪者；跟踪者；追踪基金；管风琴的连杆；跟踪仪；挂钩利率抵押
n. 小道；小径；铁路轨道；线路；足迹；踪迹；车辙；歌曲；音乐；轮距；赛道；跑道
n. 摹图；描图；淡淡的痕迹；冰上划痕

word_family.mean: v. 找到；发现；映描；描摹；跟踪；追踪；追溯；描绘；查考；追究

sense_info_list.en: a mark or line of marks left by a person, animal, or vehicle in passing
sense_info_list.zh: 足迹; 踪迹; 跟踪; 追踪

examination_example.sentence: The study was done using equipment to <highlight>track</highlight> and record brain wave activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究使用设备来跟踪和记录脑电波活动。

examination_example.sentence: Governments and businesses worldwide are creating smartphone apps to help <highlight>track</highlight> the spread of COVID-19.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界各国政府和企业正在开发智能手机应用程序，以帮助追踪2019冠状病毒疾病的传播。

examination_example.sentence: To prevent COVID-19 from spreading further, we'd better <highlight>track</highlight> down people who have been in contact with COVID-19 patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为防止COVID-19进一步传播，我们最好追踪与COVID-19患者有过接触的人。

examination_example.sentence: Last weekend, I took Lucy to a park, where she discovered a <highlight>track</highlight> with large bumps (凸块) and sharp turns．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周末，我带露西去了一个公园，在那里她发现了一条有着大坡度和急转弯的小路。

examination_example.sentence: Lucy rode her bike around the whole <highlight>track</highlight> without falling once．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 露西骑着自行车绕着赛道跑了一圈，一次也没有摔倒。

examination_example.sentence: She even took the bike off the <highlight>track</highlight> and into the main park to practice pushing off and picking up speed．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她甚至把自行车从赛道上拿下来，进入主公园练习起步和提速。

examination_example.sentence: As Zack drew a sweeping curve of train <highlight>track</highlight>, his hand knocked over the jar of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当扎克画出铁轨的弧线时，他的手碰翻了盛水的罐子。

examination_example.sentence: However, there were many dangerous accidents on the train <highlight>tracks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，火车轨道上发生了许多危险的事故。

examination_example.sentence: It can run at the speed of up to 50 km/h on the <highlight>tracks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以在轨道上以每小时50公里的速度运行。

examination_example.sentence: What she loved most was running with the school <highlight>track</highlight> team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她最喜欢的是和学校田径队一起跑步。

examination_example.sentence: China's star skater Wu Dajing broke men's 500m short <highlight>track</highlight> speed skating world record in the quarterfinals of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympic Games.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在平昌冬奥会四分之一决赛中，中国明星滑冰运动员武大靖打破了男子500米短道速滑世界纪录。

sense_info_list.en: a course of action; a way of proceeding

examination_example.sentence: Since then, Jozef has become crazy about the team and has kept <highlight>track</highlight> of almost all their international competitions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，Jozef对球队变得疯狂，几乎跟进了他们所有的国际比赛。

examination_example.sentence: Then another man came onto the <highlight>track</highlight>—Derek's father, Jim.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这时，另一个人来到了跑道上——德里克的父亲吉姆。
